title: Troll Thread
body:
Give me your Trundle art!

I have never played this troll but I am wondering about it. How is he right now? Who is he strong vs? Weak vs? What's his best skin? Is he worth it to pick up? Jungle? Top? :)

Gentleman Trundle?
